timeline.raw_data: {"type": "email", "timestamp": "2025-08-08T12:33:46", "sender_email": "lila.patalano@gmail.com", "recipient_email": "rishabh.m@amberstudent.com", "subject": "Re: Hi Lila, amber is here to help you book your ideal student home in London! Let's go!", "message": "Hi! Thank you for getting in touch, I will be coming with my small dog can you confirm the rooms are pet friendly ?\\nThank you!\\nLila\\n\\nIl giorno ven 8 ago 2025 alle 14:19 <[rishabh.m@amberstudent.com]()> ha scritto:\\n\\nHi Lila,\\n\\nWarm Greetings!\\n\\nThank you for contacting [amberstudent.com]() and providing us with the opportunity to assist you in booking your ideal student home.\\n\\nI am Rishabh, your booking manager for London. It is my pleasure to help you book the accommodation as requested.\\n\\nI've shortlisted the following properties based on your preferences:\\n[Rathbone Place, London]()\\n[View Videos]() | [View 3D Tour]()\\n\\n\u2022 Save Up to \u00a3800+ When You Bundle Your Student Essentials!\\n\u2022 Bills Included, Common Amenities, Property Rules, Safety and Security.\\n\u2022 \ud83d\udccd 0.7 mi from London City Center\\n\u2022 \ud83d\ude97 10 mins \u2022 \ud83d\ude8c 5 mins \u2022 \ud83d\udeb6\u200d\u2642\ufe0f 16 mins\\n\\nHere are your options for various rooms - 2025 move-in (45-51 weeks, 52+ weeks, 37-44 weeks):\\n\u2022 Half Twin Bedrooms\\n\u2022 52 week | 9 Aug, 2025 - 7 Aug, 2026 | \u00a3330/week\\n\u2022 Double Bedroom\\n\u2022 52 week | 5 Sep, 2025 - 3 Sep, 2026 | \u00a3435/week\\n\\n2 options in 2 room types (private)\\n\\n[Book Now]() | [View Rooms]()\\n\\nPlease let me know if you have any queries. You can reply to this email or WhatsApp me on the number mentioned in my signature below for further assistance.\\nSpots fill up fast, so be sure to act quickly once you check out the properties.\\nThanks again for choosing Amber - we\u2019re excited to get you all set for your stay.\\n\\nKind regards,\\n\\n[amberstudent.com]\\n\\nRishabh M\\n\\nSenior Operation Associate\\n\\nPhone: [+447460047271]()\\n\\nWhatsapp: [+447460047271]()\\n\\nEmail: [rishabh.m@amberstudent.com]()\\n\\nWebsite: [amberstudent.com]()", "snippet": "Hi! Thank you for getting in touch, I will be coming with my small dog can you confirm the rooms are pet friendly ? Thank you! Lila Il giorno ven 8 ago 2025 alle 14:19 <rishabh.m@amberstudent.com", "direction": "inbound", "sender_type": "student", "agent_email": "rishabh.m@amberstudent.com", "student_email": "lila.patalano@gmail.com"}

transcripts.transcript_text: Speaker A: Messagerie Orange, bonjour. La personne que vous essayez de joindre n'est pas disponible. Veuillez laisser votre message après le bip.

Speaker A: Hello?
Speaker B: Hi. Is it the number for a viewing on Caledonian Street?
Speaker A: Actually this address from ambitious student. Can you please tell me which property is this about?
Speaker B: Sorry, I couldn't hear.
Speaker A: So actually this and this. I actually work in accommodation providers. So can you please confirm like which property you reach to you.
Speaker B: So I can't hear.
Speaker A: Is it fine if I connect you on WhatsApp?
Speaker B: Yeah, sure. Great, thank you.
Speaker A: Messagerie Orange, bonjour. La personne que vous essayez de joindre n'est pas disponible.
Speaker A: Messagerie orange bonjour la personne que vous essayez de joindre n'est pas disponible.
